description: Connect Instagram to your workflows. Access account and media data, and streamline content tasks from one place.

capabilities.name: get_profile_info
capabilities.description: Get Instagram business profile information including followers, bio, and account details

capabilities.name: get_media_posts
capabilities.description: Get recent media posts from Instagram account with engagement metrics and pagination support

capabilities.name: get_media_insights
capabilities.description: Get detailed analytics and performance metrics for a specific Instagram post

capabilities.name: publish_media
capabilities.description: Upload and publish an image or video to Instagram with caption, location, and automatic aspect ratio validation

capabilities.name: get_account_insights
capabilities.description: Get account-level analytics including reach, profile views, and website clicks over a time period

capabilities.name: validate_access_token
capabilities.description: Validate your Instagram access token and check permissions

capabilities.name: get_account_pages
capabilities.description: Get Facebook pages connected to your account (needed for some Instagram operations)

capabilities.name: get_conversations
capabilities.description: Get Instagram DM conversations (requires instagram_manage_messages permission and Advanced Access)

capabilities.name: get_conversation_messages
capabilities.description: Get messages from a specific Instagram DM conversation (requires Advanced Access)

capabilities.name: send_dm
capabilities.description: Send a direct message on Instagram (requires Advanced Access and 24-hour response window)
